metadata.og:title: File:Queen Elisabeth of the Belgians with Royal Belgian Family in 1916.jpg - Wikimedia Commons

text:
DescriptionQueen Elisabeth of the Belgians with Royal Belgian Family in 1916.jpg

English:  Queen Elizabeth of the Belgians photographing King George V. (not shown) while he is decorating British soldiers at the front. Behind her are the Royal Belgian Children, Prince Charles Theodore, Princess Marie Jose, and Prince Leopold, Heir to the Throne. Beside the
latter, in the foreground, is the Prince of Wales. (Photo from Central News Photo Service.)


Date

13 August 1916


Source

The New York times (New-York, N.Y.), September 10, 1916


Author

Central News Photo Service


Other versions

Description


English:  The Official Visits To the Western Front, 1914-1918
Albert I (wearing the uniform of a colonel of the 5th Dragoon Guards), King of Belgians, and Elisabeth, Queen of Belgians, with their two sons, watching the presentation of decorations to about 30 Belgian officers by King George V at La Panne, 13th August 1916.


Date

13 August 1916 (First World War)


Source/Photographer

http://media.iwm.org.uk/iwm/mediaLib//228/media-228107/large.jpg







This photograph Q 986 comes from the collections of the Imperial War Museums.






Permission(Reusing this file)
